overview: Blunt, Jibtech Productions' follow-up to the critically acclaimed Scandalous!, brings you the best highlights from the 2001-2002 ski season without the candy coating. This action-packed video presents today's top skiers -- Tanner Hall, Mickael Deschenaux, Jon Olsson, Boyd Easley and Pep Fujas -- along with a host of up-and-comers.
title: Blunt.
